name: boostnote.next
description: A Polished Notes App with Github Flavored Markdown

scripts.dev:cloud: env-cmd cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-webpack.json" webpack-dev-server --mode development --config webpack.cloud.config.ts
scripts.dev:mobile: env-cmd cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-webpack.json" webpack-dev-server --mode development --config webpack.mobile.config.ts
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-api
scripts.build:electron-dev: npm run build:electron-renderer-dev && npm run build:electron-main-dev
scripts.build:electron-staging: npm run build:electron-renderer-staging && npm run build:electron-main-staging
scripts.build:electron-prod: npm run build:electron-renderer-prod && npm run build:electron-main-prod
scripts.build:electron-renderer-dev: rimraf electron/compiled && env-cmd --file .env cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-webpack.json" webpack --mode production
scripts.build:electron-renderer-staging: rimraf electron/compiled && env-cmd --file .env.staging cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-webpack.json" webpack --mode production
scripts.build:electron-renderer-prod: rimraf electron/compiled && env-cmd --file .env.production cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-webpack.json" webpack --mode production
scripts.build:electron-main-dev: rimraf electron/index.js && env-cmd --file .env ts-node -P tsconfig-webpack.json scripts/build-electron-main
scripts.build:electron-main-staging: rimraf electron/index.js && env-cmd --file .env.staging ts-node -P tsconfig-webpack.json scripts/build-electron-main
scripts.build:electron-main-prod: rimraf electron/index.js && env-cmd --file .env.production ts-node -P tsconfig-webpack.json scripts/build-electron-main
scripts.prepack: rimraf dist && npm run meta && env-cmd --file .env.production cross-env PREPACK=true electron-builder --dir
scripts.pack: rimraf dist && npm run meta && env-cmd --file .env.production electron-builder
scripts.release: npm run build:electron-prod && rimraf dist && npm run meta && env-cmd --file .env.production electron-builder -- --publish
scripts.build:cloud-staging: rimraf compiled-cloud && env-cmd --file .env.staging cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-webpack.json" webpack --mode production --config webpack.cloud.config.ts
scripts.build:cloud-prod: rimraf compiled-cloud && env-cmd --file .env.production cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-webpack.json" webpack --mode production --config webpack.cloud.config.ts
scripts.build:mobile-staging: rimraf compiled-mobile && env-cmd --file .env.staging cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-webpack.json" webpack --mode production --config webpack.mobile.config.ts
scripts.build:mobile-prod: rimraf compiled-mobile && env-cmd --file .env.production cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig-webpack.json" webpack --mode production --config webpack.mobile.config.ts
scripts.deploy:cloud-staging: npm run build:cloud-staging && npm run deploy-upload:cloud-staging && npm run deploy-refresh:cloud-staging
scripts.deploy:cloud-prod: npm run build:cloud-prod && npm run deploy-upload:cloud-prod && npm run deploy-refresh:cloud-prod
scripts.deploy:mobile-staging: npm run build:mobile-staging && npm run deploy-upload:mobile-staging && npm run deploy-refresh:mobile-staging
scripts.deploy:mobile-prod: npm run build:mobile-prod && npm run deploy-upload:mobile-prod && npm run deploy-refresh:mobile-prod
scripts.deploy-upload:cloud-staging: env-cmd --file .env.staging -x aws s3 sync ./compiled-cloud s3://\$CLOUD_S3_BUCKET --acl public-read
scripts.deploy-upload:cloud-prod: env-cmd --file .env.production -x aws s3 sync ./compiled-cloud s3://\$CLOUD_S3_BUCKET --acl public-read
scripts.deploy-upload:mobile-staging: env-cmd --file .env.staging -x aws s3 sync ./compiled-mobile s3://\$MOBILE_S3_BUCKET --acl public-read
scripts.deploy-upload:mobile-prod: env-cmd --file .env.production -x aws s3 sync ./compiled-mobile s3://\$MOBILE_S3_BUCKET --acl public-read

author: Junyoung Choi <fluke8259@gmail.com>
